title: Position Sizing Calculator
prompt: Create a position sizing calculator interface. Top section: Input fields showing 'Account Balance: $10,000', 'Risk Per Trade: 1.5%', 'Stop Loss: 35 pips'. Middle section: Calculation breakdown in steps - 'Risk Amount = $10,000 x 1.5% = $150', 'Pip Value = $10 per lot', 'Position Size = $150 / (35 pips x $10) = 0.43 lots'. Bottom section: Result display showing large '0.43 LOTS' with adjustment buttons. Side panel: Quick risk presets (0.5%, 1%, 1.5%, 2%). Include visual scale showing position relative to account. Warning indicator if position too large. Dark background (#1E293B) with blue (#3B82F6) accents. Modern calculator app style.
negative_prompt: cluttered inputs, hard to follow calculation, inconsistent number formatting, too technical
